page.title: 07GUY FAWKES
page.content: Every year some of the parents and friends in our village build us a very big bonfire for{Guy Fawkes}night on November 5th.They go down to local farm for branches and to the garage for old tyres.They bring back trailer loads of hedge clippings and gigantic tyres.The Juniors in the school make the guy.He (or she!) is usually 8 feet tall and is made from clothes left over from the jumble sale.People come from the villages and places all around.First of all the fire is lit,then we have a firework display.We have a beer tent,which sells soup, drinks,jacket potatoes,bread rolls and hot dogs (sausages in bread rolls).
